nodes.text: Blisterbugs were small, non-sentient, venomous creatures. Care had to be taken when poisoned with blisterbug venom, as an allergic reaction could cause swelling and possibly death. A Mandalorian once died from suffocation as he refused to remove the breastplate of his Mandalorian armor, believing it was dishonorable to do so. The bounty hunter veteran Ro-San Borokki wrote about the dangers of blisterbug venom in her chapter The Hunt, which was published in the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook.
Blisterbugs were first mentioned in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett which was released on October 15, 2013 and written by Daniel Wallace, Ryder Windham, and Jason Fry.
